title: PVP,net Kernel error
body:
this is seriously annoying. i had this issue back in feb/march so i stopped playing and tried all solutions to no avail.

almost half a year later the same is happening. no fix is working at all. gpu driver is up to date, windows updates are all installed

im on windows 10. running korean language install (for windows).

EDIT: i have the processes, network and dxdiag on hand. id rather not post the raw text here since it will be long unless needed.

replies.body:
These Kernel errors are typically caused by problems with your system permissions. When League doesn't have the permissions necessary to interact with files outside of the League folder, it will often cause these errors. Our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) goes over the most common solutions for this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
